command_not_found_desc:
The command `{0}` could not be found.
Use `{1} help` for a list of commands.
no_command_entered_desc: Type `{0} help` for a list of commands.
prefix_required_desc:
To use commands with this bot, please use the prefix `{0}`.
For more information, type `{0} help` for a list of commands.
restricted_channel_desc:
Sorry, this bot can only be used in one of these channels:
```{0}```
nsfw_required_desc: 4chan content is unrated, so you may only use the bot in a NSFW channel.
editor_required_desc: You must be a bot developer to perform this action.
help_footer: Created by @memedealer#6607 | Find me on GitHub!
random_helpmsg: {0} random [board] - Optionally add a board name to pull from
random_error: Failed to get a random post!
random_error_desc:
Please [contact the developer](https://github.com/Romejanic/4chan-Discord-Bot/issues/new/) and give them this message:
```{0}```
random_noboard_desc:
The board you entered (`{0}`) does not exist!
Please enter the name of an existing 4chan board.
post_removal_desc: This post was removed by the requesting user.
debug_nocmd:
Please enter one of the following sub-commands:
```{0}```
debug_reload_desc: The strings have been reloaded from `strings.json`.
debug_dump_config_desc:
Server configs have been dumped.
Server configs will be re-fetched from database.
debug_reload_strings: Reload strings from the strings.json file
debug_dump_configs: Dump config cache of all servers, forcing them to fetch from database next time.
post_nopost_desc: Post `{0}` in board `/{1}/` doesn't exist or couldn't be found.
config_notserver_desc:
This command can only be used on a server!
[Click here](https://discordapp.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=592655834568327179&permissions=124992&scope=bot) to invite to your server.
config_notadmin_desc: You must have the `ADMINISTRATOR` permission on this server to use this command!
config_help_desc:
Here is a list of all config options you can alter on your server.

For information on a specific one, type `{0} config <name>`.
config_unknown_key_desc:
The config option `{0}` is unknown!
Type `{1} config` for a list of options.
config_unknown_error_desc:
Sorry, something went wrong while changing your server config!

{0}
config_default_board_description:
The default board used by the random command.

**Current Value:** {0}
config_default_board_clear: The default board has been reset to the global default (`/{0}/`).
config_default_board_set: The default board has been changed to `/{0}/`.
config_default_board_toolong:
The board name you entered was too long!

The maximum length allowed is 10 characters, you entered {0}.
config_prefix_description:
The prefix used to detect commands.

**Current Value:** {0}
config_prefix_clear:
The prefix has been reset to the global default!
All subsequent commands must begin with `{0}`.
config_prefix_set:
The prefix has been changed for your server!

All subsequent commands must begin with `{0}`.
config_prefix_toolong:
The prefix you entered was too long!

The maximum length allowed is 10 characters, you entered {0}.
config_removal_time_description:
How many seconds the user has to react to a post with :x: to remove it.

**Current Value:** {0}
config_removal_time_clear: The removal time has been reset to the global default (`{0} seconds`).
config_removal_time_set: The removal time has been changed to `{0} seconds`.
config_removal_time_invalid:
You have entered an invalid removal time (`{0} seconds`).
The removal time must be a number between 10 and 300 seconds.
config_restricted_channels_desc_none: The bot can speak in all NSFW channels.
config_restricted_channels_desc_list:
The bot can speak in the following channels:
```{0}```
config_restricted_channels_reset:
The allowed channels list has been erased.
The bot can now speak in any NSFW channel.
config_restricted_channels_notag: Please choose a valid channel to toggle by tagging it! (e.g. `{0} config allowed_channels #general`).
config_restricted_channels_invalid_desc: Please select an existing text channel which is marked as NSFW.
help_help: Lists all commands and their usage.
random_help: Gets a random post from the default board or a specified board.
debug_help: Debug commands to aid development of the bot.
post_help: Gets the OP post of the thread with the given ID from the given board.
config_help: Allows you to configure the behaviour of the bot for your server.
info_help: See support links, bot version and system info.
